name: Tiru
introduction: The gods caused 'the catastrophe', and the gods saved me, so that I could spread my culture and my faith to you.
hateHello: I would have liked to see you survive
declaringWar: You oppose the good sense of religion, I MUST exterminate you, so that the gods do not start again.
attacked: I have often had enemies who opposed me and the gods. And today, they are no more, and I stand before you. You should have thought before attacking.
defeated: you, have defeated, me? The gods are no longer on my side... No impossible ! I realized there is only one posibility. They have been for a long time dead. 'The catastrophe' was not their fault.

name: Lilelle
introduction: We've lost all our knowledge since... that. But we've kept our intelligence. We can help you if you'd like.
neutralHello: Hello, so you still believe in gods? That's adorable.
hateHello: We will use all our intelligence to harm you.
declaringWar: You are too stupid, we must eliminate you monkeys so as not to slow down our research.
attacked: I knew you were stupid, but not stupid enough to attack us.
defeated: What? You're just monkeys! INCOMPETENT, STUPID, MORONIC MONKEYS! How could you have defeated us?
